system.description: Your understanding of Tau technology has reached a level of mastery unmatched by most.
system.benefit: The explorer can spend a Fate Point to Automatically succeed on any Tech-Use Test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to their Intelligence Bonus.

prerequisites.text: Tau, Scholastic Lore (Tau Empire), Common Lore (War)

specialAbilities.name: Fate-Fueled Mastery
specialAbilities.description: You can spend a Fate Point to automatically succeed on any Tech-Use test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to your Intelligence Bonus.
